title: SGC 30 Tolstoi Doyle Portrait FS - Price Revised Look Again
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: SGC 30 Tolstoi Doyle Portrait FS - Price Revised Look Again
posts.post_content:
Up for grabs is a PSA 2 Snodgrass Batting with the AB 350 c Frame reverse

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10578/snodgrass-batting-ab[/IMG]

and an SGC 30 Doyle Potrait with the Tolstoi reverse

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/13938/doyle-portrait-tolstoi[/IMG]

Snodgrass has a little discoloration (read "light stain) on the left side front and back.  No creases.  Nice American Beauty back and centered well front and back.
Asking $OLD to add this to your collection.

Doyle has a little crease in the left upper corner and slightly more rounded corners than Snodgrass.  The Tolstoi back is nice with no paper loss and is also well centered.  Asking $69 to add a very presentable Tolstoi to your hoard.

Both prices are net to me and include shipping.

What's not to like?  If they are still available in 48 hours, shoot me an offer.
Just a little bump.  Don’t wait.
